scripts.dev:check: node -e "const net = require('net'); const server = net.createServer(); server.listen(5173, () => { console.log('✅ 端口5173可用'); server.close(); process.exit(0); }); server.on('error', () => { console.log('⚠️ 端口5173被占用，尝试使用5174'); process.exit(1); });"
scripts.dev:safe: npm run dev:check && npm run dev || vite --port 5174
scripts.stop: pkill -f 'vite.*5173' || pkill -f 'vite.*5174' || echo '没有找到运行中的Vite进程'
scripts.stop:safe: pkill -f 'vite' || echo '没有找到运行中的Vite进程'
scripts.restart: npm run stop && sleep 2 && npm run dev:safe
scripts.restart:smart: npm run stop:safe && sleep 2 && npm run dev:smart
